name: Ziyad Tariq
text: I don't know why they have such bad reviews like seriously? Tho it is a small outlet but pizza is so good and tasty staff is good plus quick service.

name: Jason Phillips
text: Had an all around great experience ordering from here. The person who answered my call, took my order, and delivered my pizzas all acted professionally. Gotta give credit where credit is due. I gave this place a chance and it worked out great!

name: Simon Laurel
text: I order from pizza hut because I want pizza hut.  I don't expect gourmet anything, as such, I've never been disappointed in terms of quality.  The service, however, I don't understand.  I just ordered delivery to my condo.  The driver ‚Ä¶More

name: jagannathan govindarajan
text: Their pizzas are pretty good and they do have courteous staff manning the front desk. It's their poor operations management that leaves me frustrated. I once had to wait for 70 minutes for a large pizza pickup because a driver had crashed. ‚Ä¶More

name: Luke Heckel
text: Quick, friendly staff and the quality you expect. They were out of the personal pans my wife and I ordered, but were quick to make it right with a whole pizza with split toppings. This place is carry out/ delivery only.

name: Dan T
text: Not the best pizza in the entire world... still really good and cheap. Most I've talked to like this location more than other ones they've tried.

name: Patrick Rex Kelly1981
text: Seems like it's run by an unorganized part-time help. Overpriced for the quality as well

name: Jay Anand
text: I like the pizza they prepare. I like pizza hut more then Dominos. Wondering why most of the pizza hut have closed down , the ones which are still open aren't maintained well.

name: Phillip Custer
text: Service is ass. $5 flavor menus online only and it took 2 hours for them to start my order. Why encourage people to order online if your not gonna prosses thir orders. And then the guy on the phone had an attitude with me asking if I still wanted my food.

name: Nicole Ampofo
text: Every inch of this store is covered in dust and smelly. I did not feel comfortable picking my food up from this location.

name: Sara Colla
text: First of all they do not even deserve the one star but i need to post this review. Last night was the worst experience I had with pizza Hut on Broad Street. I do not even want to give them any stars. First off I ordered food at 6:30 p.m. ‚Ä¶More

name: Pixelcola
text: I received the pizza much later than the estimated time at pick-up, and it had a strand of hair in it. Don't go here if you're cautious about how your food is handled.

name: JOSE ACEVEDO
text: Worst  place to order from they took over 1 hours. And after all the waiting . Pizza was cold and hard,  no taste . And they even deliver the wrong  pizza and was not what I order. I'm don't with this.  After I spend for it.

text: Benny's favorite pizza!! They catered his party and everything was perfect
